mapper.insert: insert into ZT_BLOG (ID, TITLE, USER_NAME, CONTENT, USER_AGE, USER_NUMBER, PRICE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select ID, TITLE, USER_NAME, CONTENT, USER_AGE, USER_NUMBER, PRICE from ZT_BLOG
